title: Dynamic Calendar and Time System
description: This unique and highly-customizable Day and Night Cycle simulates time according to your customized calendar and settings. Customize the names of your Months and Days of the Week. Choose the length of Daytime and Nighttime, and much more.
longDescription:
Time Settings Preview Gif

 

Setting Up the Calendar Gif

 

Results at Runtime

 

The Dynamic Calendar and Time System is a highly configurable day and night cycle that comes with a customizable Calendar. Editing the Calendar lets you define the names of the days of the week and the months. As well as how many days are in a week, and how many days are in a month. You can also easily define how long the daytime and nighttime should last.

 

Event Dispatches have also been created and fire whenever the hour, day, month, and year get incremented. Giving you the ability to easily create events that trigger as time passes in your world. This will allow you to create events in your world that happen on a schedule. Want a town in your game to hold a festival every month?

Or bring all of your NPCs to life with birthdays? If so, the Dynamic Calendar and Time System is exactly what you need.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • A customizable Day and Night Cycle
  •  A system to create and configure a Calendar that the Day and Night Cycle uses to create events
  •  A unique User Interface to easily configure the many parameters of the Dynamic Calendar and Time System
  • Easily view everything that is happening under the hood at runtime in one click with the debugging parameters
  • Well commented and organized blueprints for scalability.
  • Want to use your own sky sphere? Easily search the comments for instructions.

Number of Blueprints: 1

Network Replicated: No


Supported Development Platforms: 4.22-4.26
